document_data.name: Putrescent Anathema
document_data.mainbody: The '''Putrescent Anathema''' was a [[disease]] present in [[Waterdeep]] in the 14{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.History: In [[1395 DR]], the disease began to spread from [[Stump Bog]]. It hit the temple-farm of [[Goldenfields]] very hard, and thousands died due to the lack of grain to fed themselves.
